snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York announced on Thursday that it had been paid back for loans used to support the government bailouts of Bear Stearns and the American International Group.
abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York announced on Thursday that it had been paid back for loans used to support the government bailouts of Bear Stearns and the American International Group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Maiden Lane Loans Repaid, but Assets Still Must Be Sold
